resources.string: CC17- MOBILE APPLICATION DESIGN AND DEVELOPMENT
⦁ We expect to learn how to design and build functional and user-friendly mobile applications using Android Studio.
⦁ We expect to improve our skills in writing clean, efficient code for mobile platforms.
⦁ We expect to understand the entire process of mobile app development, from planning and UI design to testing and deployment.
⦁ We expect to collaborate as a team and divide tasks fairly so that everyone contributes to the project.
⦁ We expect to receive guidance and feedback from our instructor to help us refine our app ideas and improve our work.
